editorialSummary.text: Grand hotel in a converted 19th-century palace with a spa, elegant dining & banquet facilities.

text.text:
I recently stayed at your hotel and had a truly wonderful experience. Everything—from the warm hospitality to the cleanliness and comfort of the room—was exceptional. The staff was incredibly courteous and helpful, always ready to assist with a smile. The service was prompt and professional, and every small detail was taken care of perfectly. I also really appreciated the overall ambiance and peaceful environment of the hotel. It made my stay relaxing and enjoyable.

Thank you for such a great experience! I would definitely recommend this hotel to others and look forward to staying here again in the future.

text.text:
We recently stayed at Rambagh Palace in one of their Historical Suites, and it was an unforgettable experience. The entire property is breathtaking – full of character, history, and charm. Every part of the palace feels special, and just walking around it is a treat for the eyes.

Our suite was elegant, spacious, and incredibly comfortable. The decor reflected the royal heritage of the palace while still offering all the modern comforts you’d expect. The bed was super cozy, and every little detail – from the lighting to the bathroom essentials – was well thought out. It felt luxurious and homely at the same time.

What made the stay even more memorable were the unique experiences – vintage car rides, cultural performances, clay pot making, yoga, and even a horse carriage ride inside the palace grounds. These little touches added so much value to our trip and kept us engaged throughout.

One of the most charming things was the peacocks roaming freely around the property – they’re friendly and beautiful, and you can even feed them!

text.text: Our first Oberoi’s Rajvilas experience was absolutely amazing. A stunning property with an extraordinary staff that is so focused on serving and while a few touched us deeply, one can see the same amount of explicit passion across all. We were completely mesmerised by the property and especially those peacocks plus the other birds who were not shy to come make friends with us for a little bit of knick knack!!! Oberoi’s is known for its personalised experience and we felt it first hand yet again!!! A special mention of Harshita, a passionate intern - you have a long way to go Harshita, all the best; Golu - who we want to thank for an interestingly humorous conversation and mocktail tasting; Virendra- thanks so much for making the experience so special for our twin daughters, Priyanshu loved your courteousness and your recommendations for breakfast and last but not the least to Triambika for the most sumptuous Rajasthani cuisine experience. Your smile can make anyone’s day!!! Loved it all!!!

text.text:
I am writing to express my deep dissatisfaction with my recent experience at your property.
From the moment we arrived, the service did not meet our expectations based on what was promised on your website. The check-in time was clearly stated as 2:00 PM, yet we were only given our room keys at 4:00 PM—a full two hours later. This delay was incredibly frustrating, especially after a long journey.
Even more disappointing is that despite lengthy conversations with the staff, we were not provided with the room we had originally booked. The accommodations we received were not in line with what was shown or described online and were not worth the price we paid.
Furthermore, the welcome and service upon arrival were far from warm or professional, which only added to our frustration.
This experience was not only inconvenient but also left us feeling misled and undervalued as guests. I hope you take this feedback seriously and look into these issues to ensure future guests do not face the same disappointment.

text.text:
One of the most breathtaking places I’ve ever visited!

I recently visited Rajmahal Palace in Jaipur, and honestly — I’m speechless! The beauty of this place is just unreal. Lush greenery everywhere, aesthetic vibes all around, and the sound of peacocks in the background made it feel like a scene from a royal dream. The palace itself gives proper mahal wali vibe — perfect for a peaceful date, a shoot, or just to soak in the grandeur.

Every corner is photogenic — literally Instagram heaven. I couldn’t get enough of it. The café and restaurant inside are also top-notch — both in service and taste.

I didn’t stay this time, but next time I’m definitely booking a stay here to experience the royal hospitality to the fullest.
Highly recommend this gem in Jaipur!

text.text:
Terrible Experience - Not Safe, Avoid at All Costs!

My wife and I booked this hotel for our stay in Jaipur, India, expecting a safe and comfortable place to rest during our travels from the USA. Unfortunately, our experience turned out to be nothing short of a nightmare.

Around 11 PM on the night 1, while we were in our room sleeping, the ceiling suddenly collapsed on us. The room's fan was bent, and as debris fell, my wife was injured with some scratches and a small injury to her head. Thankfully, we weren’t more seriously hurt, but this incident left us shaken and traumatized. The hotel did offer us a refund and free meals, but after such a terrifying experience, we couldn’t trust the safety of the place anymore.

We chose this hotel based on its appearance and amenities, but after the ceiling collapse, it was clear that the building was poorly maintained. It didn’t seem safe, and the lack of guests staying there only added to our concerns. We immediately cut our trip short after the incident and decided to stay at another hotel.

I would strongly advise anyone considering this hotel to look elsewhere. It was a terrifying experience that left us with lasting trauma, and it’s not worth the risk to your safety.

text.text: My birthday dinner at Marriott Jaipur in 2023 was the perfect end to an adventurous day of exploring Jaipur's three famous forts! The ambiance was absolutely excellent, creating a wonderfully relaxing atmosphere after all that walking or trekking to be more precise. And the food quality? Simply superb – every dish was a delight. While it was a bit on the expensive side, the overall experience was truly nice and memorable. I would definitely recommend it for a special occasion or a well-deserved treat!

Highly Recommended Stay at Jaipur Marriott

If you're visiting the Pink City, my personal recommendation—you must stay at Jaipur Marriott. The moment you step in, you're welcomed with warmth, elegance, and unmatched hospitality. The rooms are spacious, the food is delightful, and the service? Simply world-class.

Whether it's a family trip or a business visit, this hotel adds a touch of magic to your stay. Trust me, it's not just a stay—it's an experience worth remembering.

Positive: if you are a food lover then hotel has a very good food selection. Great work by Chefs.

editorialSummary.text: Upscale hotel in a former palace offering plush rooms & an outdoor pool, plus fine dining options.

text.text:
We had the pleasure of celebrating our anniversary at the magnificent Jai Mahal Palace in Jaipur on 20th May 2025 and it was truly an unforgettable experience.

From the moment we arrived, we were welcomed with a beautiful floral reception that set the tone for our entire stay. The warmth and hospitality extended to us throughout our visit made us feel genuinely special and completely at home.

Every member of the staff we interacted with was incredibly courteous and professional. Special thanks to the Front Office Manager and the wonderful team of ladies at the reception for their gracious assistance. We would also like to express our appreciation to Mr. Vikram, Mr. Aslam, and Chef Pradeep Thakur from the restaurant team — each one of them contributed to making our dining experience truly exceptional. The food was simply beyond our expectations — delicious, thoughtfully prepared, and served with great care.

We were also grateful for the flexibility shown with our early check-in and late check-out, which added to our comfort and convenience.

A heartfelt thank you to Mr. Rathore, the General Manager, for his thoughtful letter and warm anniversary wishes. It added a very personal touch to our stay.

It’s clear that the impeccable hospitality we experienced is a reflection of the Taj culture — one that prioritizes warmth, care, and excellence in every detail.

God bless you all, and thank you once again for making our anniversary so memorable.

Thank you
Pradeep Batra
Monica Batra

text.text:
We had an unforgettable stay at Dileep Kothi in Jaipur. Once the palace of the royal family Barli, it has now been transformed into a stunning boutique hotel – elegant, spotless, and decorated with extraordinary attention to detail.

From the moment we arrived, we felt truly welcomed. A delicious cake and a bottle of wine were waiting in our room, which made our experience even more special.

The absolute highlight of our visit was the cooking class with the Barli family and Chef Govind. It was a unique evening filled with warmth, cultural exchange, and wonderful insights into authentic local recipes.

Dileep Kothi is a true oasis of peace in the heart of bustling Jaipur. We can wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone looking for a refined, personal, and unforgettable experience.

text.text: A really special, interesting and luxurious stay in Jaipur. This memorable boutique hotel is conveniently located and so well run by Mrs. Satkriti and her team (special mention to Govind, Mukesh and Yadit) and also boasts fabulous dining courtesy of Chef Dinesh and his excellent team. Suites are lavishly furnished and the entire hotel is sparkling clean. The communal dining area is beautifully set and a great way to interact with other guests. The most special antique photographs adorn the walls and it was a privilege to get a closer look into this royal family's heritage. Would 100% recommend Dileep Kothi to anyone travelling to Jaipur.

The interesting history behind this place, meeting the down to earth royals in person, getting to know them, the interiors, the friendly helpful service, friendly staff, the homely food and their hospitality is something that makes you want to stay longer. Very centrally located, easy access to a lot of popular touristic places and a very comfortable stay. A must visit place!

text.text:
One of the worst hotel experiences I’ve ever had. The staff has a very bad attitude – they don’t help with anything and simply say “no” to every request. There is no valet service, and the hotel is located in a very bad spot inside narrow streets. The room was poorly maintained with broken switches, dirty bedsheets, and overall unhygienic conditions. Breakfast was terrible, and staff made no effort to provide anything properly.

Parking is a nightmare – there is no proper parking space, and I had to keep moving my car around looking for space multiple times.

Overall, extremely unprofessional and careless staff with the worst service. Definitely not recommended at all.

text.text:
We had booked online at Umaid Bhawan. We got free pick-up facility. But as soon as we reached, we had to carry our luggage ourselves to the reception because there was no bell boy available to help. We checked in a room but the curtains there were torn, so they shifted us to another room. As soon as we entered the another room, the room was so small that even our luggage bag could not be opened. The balcony was also very small. When we complained at the reception that these were not the category of rooms that we had booked, the receptionist said that this is heritage property and all the rooms here are same. The pictures on the internet are just for reference. We were very surprised but they ignored us. The tea bags provided in the rooms were also open and not in proper packaging, which is below standard for a heritage property. When we tried to turn on the TV, we found out that the set top box was faulty. The housekeeping staff tried to fix the TV for half an hour but finally said sorry and left. Then our wifi was also not working so we complained to the reception twice but still we did not get any help. Our booking was for 2 days but we immediately cancelled our bookings for the next day and booked in another hotel. Because there is no point in staying where guests' comfort is not taken care of. Decor and food was good. Otherwise service needs improvement.
So our stay at Umaid Bhawan Royal Style Heritage Boutique Hotel was nothing special.

originalText.text:
We had booked online at Umaid Bhawan. We got free pick-up facility. But as soon as we reached, we had to carry our luggage ourselves to the reception because there was no bell boy available to help. We checked in a room but the curtains there were torn, so they shifted us to another room. As soon as we entered the another room, the room was so small that even our luggage bag could not be opened. The balcony was also very small. When we complained at the reception that these were not the category of rooms that we had booked, the receptionist said that this is heritage property and all the rooms here are same. The pictures on the internet are just for reference. We were very surprised but they ignored us. The tea bags provided in the rooms were also open and not in proper packaging, which is below standard for a heritage property. When we tried to turn on the TV, we found out that the set top box was faulty. The housekeeping staff tried to fix the TV for half an hour but finally said sorry and left. Then our wifi was also not working so we complained to the reception twice but still we did not get any help. Our booking was for 2 days but we immediately cancelled our bookings for the next day and booked in another hotel. Because there is no point in staying where guests' comfort is not taken care of. Decor and food was good. Otherwise service needs improvement.
So our stay at Umaid Bhawan Royal Style Heritage Boutique Hotel was nothing special.

text.text:
Bhanwar singh was an awesome steward at the hotel and he was very helpful and attentive and caring for our needs.
Overall we loved our stay at Umaid! Perfect location, and the staff were so amazing. Would recommend anyone to stay here.

originalText.text:

text.text:
The front desk staff, Bharat, was friendly, warm, and helpful. When we checked in, there was a small problem with the room we had booked, so he couldn’t give us that exact one. But he handled it quickly, helped us as much as he could, and gave us another room that was very comfortable — even better than we expected.

This hotel is very unique — it was the most memorable one on our whole trip. It was started in 1993 by a former royal family from Borunda. The whole place has a royal Rajasthani style, like an old palace, with carved balconies and a rooftop restaurant. Staying here felt like traveling back in time… almost like being royalty!

The hotel breakfast was also great, with many tasty options. The staff were very kind and welcoming. If you ever visit Jaipur, you should definitely stay here for a night—or even a few nights. You won’t regret it :)

editorialSummary.text: Refined hotel in a restored 1800s mansion with chic rooms & regal suites, plus an outdoor pool.

text.text:
We absolutely loved the Samode Haveli. The courtyard bar is a gorgeous place to hang out in and have a drink. The interval room is quite quite beautiful where they greet you with a drink. The area by the pool is relaxing also with three cabanas and the service friendly and lovely. The pool is a delightful space. Sunbeds facing the garden are best. The gym is modern and has a nice aspect in an air conditioned glazed balcony overlooking the pool. Our room, 118 was super large and comfortable. Housekeeping and laundry were impeccable quick and polite. Food at the restaurant was delicious - from the breakfast dhosas, bhurji to the evening tikka / tandoori chicken with delicious breads and jeers or veg rice and amazing vegetable dishes.
Service was impeccable through out. The courtyard was cool enough in August for us to eat outside in the evening but the restaurant room is glorious as is the winter bar next to it which is stunning. Casting around for an issue the only one I could find was that I went to get our bags on arrival as I wanted a swim and they took a while to arrive. In other words Samode Haveli is near perfect. We had a lovely stay in the Oberoi in Agra and were wondering if we should’ve gone to them in Jaipur - Samode was by far the better choice with atmospheric and beautiful settings and top service. Loved it.

text.text:
A Lovely Stay — Worth the Wait

I’ve been living in India since 2010 and always wanted to visit this hotel. After a not-so-great experience at Neemrana Fort, my family wasn’t interested in antique-style hotels — until today, when we came on a whim. We’re so glad we did!

We stayed in a Deluxe Suite and loved it — spacious, clean, and full of charm. If you enjoy swimming, the pool is a definite highlight.

Overall, a great stay for the whole family. We’d happily come back!

The staff were incredibly warm and helpful, making the whole experience feel special (special shout-out to Gokul, our driver!). I really enjoyed the food, and there were plenty of cozy little corners around the haveli to relax and unwind. Sunset drinks on the rooftop were a highlight—peaceful, atmospheric, and a perfect way to end the day.

editorialSummary.text: Modern lodging with funky rooms & rooftop dining, plus kids' activities, an outdoor pool & a spa.

text.text:
We had the most wonderful stay at Taj Devi Ratn Resort & Spa in Jaipur, and I cannot thank the entire staff and management team especially Mr Robin, the Manager enough for their exceptional hospitality. We had mentioned that it was my father’s birthday, and to our surprise, they went above and beyond by upgrading our stay and making the entire day incredibly special for him and for all of us.

Every detail, from the warm greetings to the thoughtful gestures, reflected genuine care and world-class service. The resort itself is stunning, but it’s the people who truly make it magical.

A heartfelt thank you to the manager and every member of the team for creating such a memorable experience. We left with full hearts and beautiful memories, and we can’t wait to visit again!

My recent visit to Devi Ratan Resort has turned out to be an unforgettable experience. The unique location amidst the valley has made the vacation rejuvenating and free from the chaos of urban lifestyle.

The Staff were incredibly welcoming and attentive throughout my stay, making my travel experience truly enjoyable.

I must highlight the food served by the restaurant was amazing making every bite count to the fullest. Chef Mr. Shareef made all great efforts to enhance our dining experience...what an Artist.

Also, the efforts infused by Mr. R.Jugar (Swim Area), Mr. M.Hussain (Vyom dining) and Jagan Ji are commendable.

Looking forward for the next one.....

Cheers
Adnan Ahmed

text.text:
Our stay at Taj Devi Ratan was nothing short of extraordinary! From the moment we arrived till the very end, the hospitality, attention to detail, and warmth of the staff truly stood out.

Loved the Big Rooms and great food !!

Every member of the team went above and beyond to make us feel at home, and their graciousness left a lasting impression. What really touched us was how thoughtfully they took care of us at check-out — surprising us with goody bags for our travel that included water bottles, delicious snacks, and other essentials. It was such a considerate gesture and reflects the kind of hospitality Taj is known for — SIMPLY AWESOME!

It’s rare to come across such a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and genuine care. Thank you, Taj Devi Ratn, for making our trip so memorable. We can’t wait to return!

text.text:
My first time at the Taj resort went great. Special thanks to the cleaning crew Mani and palak! Clean and quick service.

I don't even know where to start, first, our room had an amazing view of the mountain line and great space, we also had amazing lunch and dinner at orientation pavilion and great dinner at vyom. Breakfast was very good, options for all.

The hotel is a great place to kill time and spend quality time with family, the pool was nice kept and the team at the recreational room were great with the team

Greetings and entrance was amazing, first impression was great, they played music and offered great gifts for the entrance, the treatment from staff were very kind.

Conclusion and feedback:

Staff treatment 10/10

- staff treated guests with respect and care

Amenities and recreational activities: 8/10

- table tennis area was in an inconvenient place, hard to play when dark and uncomfortable without AC, at Taj, this kind of facility should have been in an AC room

Food and dining: 10/10

- amazing food and quick service

Details and Design: 10/10

- well kept area, clean and luxurious. Really brings out the beautiful details of Rajasthan.

- golf carts mostly came on time, very smartly managed

Conclusion 2:

Great resort, must recommend

text.text:
This place is absolutely perfect for a holiday getaway with family or friends! I recently visited with my family to celebrate a birthday, and everything exceeded our expectations. The room was fantastic, the arrangements were spot-on, and the food—just delicious.

We chose the all-meals package (lunch, dinner, and breakfast), and it was totally worth it. The food was fresh, tasty, less oily, and mildly spiced—just the way we like it. My family loved every bit of it, especially the poolside area, which was a big hit with everyone.

We had an amazing time and would definitely love to visit again very soon!

text.text:
We had a wonderful stay at this hotel! From the moment we arrived, the staff was welcoming and attentive, making sure we had everything we needed for a comfortable experience. The rooms were clean, spacious, and well-appointed, with beautiful touches that reflected the local charm.

A special highlight of our trip was our driver, Ram. He was incredibly friendly, knowledgeable about the area, and always went above and beyond to ensure we were comfortable and informed. Whether it was navigating the busy streets or sharing interesting insights about the culture and landmarks, Ram truly elevated our experience. We felt safe and well taken care of every step of the way.

We’re so grateful for the hospitality and would definitely recommend both the hotel and Ram to anyone visiting.

editorialSummary.text: Contemporary business hotel with 2 restaurants & 2 bars, plus a spa, an outdoor pool & event space.

text.text:
My experience at Hilton Jaipur was absolutely delightful. Right from the time I walked in, I was treated with courtesy and professionalism. The lobby is so elegant and friendly looking, it immediately relaxes you.

The rooms were well-spacious, neat, and tidy, and all the minute details were well taken care of. The housekeeping staff did a great job in providing comfort and hygiene.

What truly impressed me was the hospitality of the staff. Every encounter whether it was from the front desk staff to restaurant service was friendly, attentive, and made me feel truly cared for. They were always willing to assist with a smile.

The cuisine was also a highlight. The spread during the buffet featured a range of dishes, both international and local, and every meal was fresh and delicious. Watching the sunset view from the rooftop in the evening is not to be missed , it provides an added special touch to the experience.

Overall, Hilton Jaipur provides the ideal combination of luxury, comfort, and hospitality. It's not so much a hotel, but a home away from home. I would highly recommend it to any visitor to Jaipur, business or pleasure.

We also used the rooftop bar and swimming pool due to the hot steamy weather. A really lovely place to stay.

What stood out the most was the hospitality – every staff member made sure the stay felt special. Even though it was just for a night, the experience was memorable and refreshing.
Highly recommend Hilton Resort Jaipur for anyone looking for a luxurious and peaceful stay in the Pink City.

text.text:
I have stayed at multiple locations of Novotel and it’s a delightful experience every time!
Stayed at the Jaipur location this time which is very conveniently located towards the outskirts of the city and easily accessible from the Mumbai expressway.
The rooms were very spacious and the bathrooms were pretty big as well. One of the areas we absolutely loved was the pool area, which is very relaxing and complete with a seating space and a separate area for lounge chairs.
The service was absolutely impeccable! We were very well taken care of, and the staff was always around to ask us if we needed anything or make changes to accommodate all the guests. One thing that can be improved though is their buffet menu, which I felt was lacking variety. The breakfast buffet was nice, with ample choices of vegetarian and non-vegetarian options. The lunch buffet, however, could be improved.
Overall, we had a nice stay and would definitely recommend it to friends and family!

text.text:
My boyfriend and I enjoyed the stay a lot. Rooms were clean, modern  and specious.
Breakfast time was busy for the restaurant, but food choice and service were very good.
We enjoyed the pool, even though pigeons that live everywhere around the city does not make it easy for the hotelier to clean the rooftop area.
Dinner ordered to the room was tasty and beer at the bar refreshing. Till 6 pm you can enjoy happy hour 2 for 1. Also, we have been pleased with the laundry service and hotel staff overall.
My unique advice is to ask for the room from the south side so street noise might be less heard.

Stayed therefor a short trip, and honestly, it delivered pretty well. The location is super convenient!! Close to major markets and the railway station, which saved a lot of time.

Rooms were clean, modern, and spacious, with everything you'd expect. No complaints there. The rooftop pool and bar area were surprisingly peaceful. Not too crowded and a great spot to unwind.

Breakfast was decent, good Indian variety, but continental lovers might find it a bit limited. Also, restaurant service was a tad slow during peak hours, but the staff were polite and doing their best.

Not ultra luxury, but a solid, reliable place with professional service and good value for the price. I’d pick it again for a comfortable city stay without fuss.

I write this review as I sit in my room, absolutely charmed and blown away by the hospitality, warmth and sheer luxury of this hotel and its extraordinary staff. Every single staff member here goes out of their way in making sure you do not as much as lift a single finger. We are staying in the room with the private garden and it is such a lovely concept. The room itself is gorgeous, the bathroom is stunning and the deep sinking tub very luxurious. This hotel  is an embodiment of an ultra pampered, idyllic Indian summer getaway. We stayed here with our little kids and every single member of the staff made sure to talk to our kids in the utmost sweet manner and made their day. When we arrived they had adorable snack plates waiting for the kids in our room with their names written on each! The highlight of the trip was custom embroidered cushions with the kids names on them waiting when we reached our room after dinner at the hotel restaurant!
They showered us all little goodies and momentous all through our stay. We didn’t feel the need to step out at all they have cultural performance every evening done very tastefully. The true meaning of a luxury hotel is really not in its rooms, infrastructure or offerings but in the staff and how they make you feel - n every member of the staff here willl treat you like royalty! We live 3 hours away and will be sure to return very very soon! Thank you Oberoi Rajvilas you have redefined the meaning of a luxury hotel for us!

text.text:
From the moment my mother and I arrived at the RAAS Rajmahal Palace on the 8th of December 2024, we were swept off our feet by the sheer grandeur and charm of this heritage property. Nestled in the heart of Jaipur, this beautifully preserved colonial palace truly encapsulates the essence of royal Rajasthan.

One of the highlights of our stay was undoubtedly the exceptional hospitality of the staff, particularly Vishal. His unwavering friendliness, attentiveness, and dedication elevated our experience to unparalleled levels of comfort and satisfaction. It is rare to encounter such impeccable service, and Vishal's warmth left an indelible impression on us, cementing RAAS Rajmahal as my ONLY choice for accommodation in Jaipur for all future visits.

The interiors of the palace are a feast for the senses, blending colonial elegance with a touch of regal opulence. Every corner of the property seemed to tell a story, with intricate designs, rich textiles, and tasteful decor that transport you back in time.

The culinary experience was equally stellar. The a la carte breakfast buffet was a delightful journey for our taste buds. Each dish was expertly crafted and brimming with flavor, offering a perfect start to our day. The attention to detail in presentation and taste was remarkable, and the service during breakfast was, as expected, impeccable.

Another standout moment of our stay was the gracious offer to upgrade to one of their exquisite suites, which I accepted without hesitation. The suite was nothing short of spectacular, with spacious, thoughtfully designed interiors and an ambiance that perfectly balanced luxury and comfort. It provided us with a sanctuary where we could unwind and soak in the royal treatment.

Everything about our stay was flawless, from the beautiful surroundings to the world-class service. The RAAS Rajmahal Palace is not just a hotel; it is an experience, a destination in itself. I cannot recommend it enough to anyone visiting Jaipur.

In summary, our stay was a royal affair filled with luxury, warmth, and unforgettable memories. Thank you to Vishal and the entire team at RAAS Rajmahal Palace for making our time there so special. We will undoubtedly return, time and time again.

The hotel itself is beautifully designed and impeccably maintained. Our room was spacious, elegantly furnished, and offered stunning views. The amenities were top-notch, and the overall comfort was unparalleled.

We highly recommend the Marriott Jaipur to anyone seeking a luxurious and unforgettable stay in Jaipur. The combination of elegant accommodations, world-class service, and exceptional dining experiences made our trip truly memorable.

A Majestic Oasis in the Heart of Jaipur

I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Jaipur Marriott Hotel, and I must say it exceeded all my expectations. From the moment I entered the grand lobby to the minute I reluctantly checked out, every aspect of my experience was nothing short of exceptional.

The hotel's ambiance exudes a perfect blend of regal charm and contemporary luxury. The attention to detail in the decor, with its intricate Rajasthani motifs and elegant furnishings, truly transported me to a bygone era while still offering all the modern comforts I could desire.

The staff at Jaipur Marriott Hotel are a testament to exceptional hospitality. They greeted me with genuine warmth and a heartfelt smile, making me feel like a valued guest from the very beginning. Every interaction with the staff was marked by their professionalism, efficiency, and an eagerness to cater to my needs.

My room was a sanctuary of comfort and style. The plush bedding, tasteful decor, and breathtaking city views made it difficult to leave the confines of this luxurious haven. The amenities provided were top-notch, and the attention to cleanliness and hygiene was commendable.

Dining at Jaipur Marriott Hotel was an absolute delight. The diverse array of culinary offerings catered to every palate, from delectable local delicacies to international cuisines prepared with finesse. The restaurants and bars provided an inviting ambiance, and the impeccable service of the staff enhanced the overall dining experience.

In conclusion, my stay at Jaipur Marriott Hotel was an enchanting experience that I will cherish forever. The impeccable service, luxurious accommodations, delectable dining options, and prime location make it the perfect choice for both leisure and business travelers. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone seeking a truly unforgettable stay in the Pink City.

text.text:
Simply amazing experience staying at this beautiful hotel.  It was a palace before it was turned into a hotel & it’s magical.  The service here was impeccable-beyond any other hotel I have ever stayed in.  I felt like royalty staying here and so comfortable.  The room itself was designed beautifully and well appointed.  Extremely luxurious feel & old world charm.  I adored how they offered a complementary tour of the palace where you were able to learn about history of the palace and the beautiful Queen who lived their as well as they offered carriage horse rides & entertainment at night that was so fun! I was able to dance to Rajastani music with professional awesome dancers and marveled at the experience, as an American, just loved it.  The music was so serene.  I also had an experience at the spa and thoroughly enjoyed my massage/facial—amazing and not as expensive as one would think!  This hotel also had superb dining—we tried each restaurant and none of the food disappointed.  Cinnamon was especially good & their breakfast buffet outstanding.  Also, this hotel was in a great location to so sightseeing, we were all over Jaipur touring and it was the perfect base.  Plus, the pool was a nice touch, but I didn’t use it - was a bit cold.
The property itself was also so alluring and well maintained-you can just enjoy a stroll around and there were even peacocks walking around and other beautiful birds!  Two stores on the property as well and ended up buying a beautiful ring at one of them for my mother in law.  Opal & diamonds- excellent quality!  They had another store with lots of antique paintings also which was fun to explore & admire the art.  Definitely stay here if you appreciate the charms of a historic palace!!!!! You will love it.

We had an unforgettable stay at Dileep Kothi in Jaipur. Once the palace of the royal family Barli, it has now been transformed into a stunning boutique hotel – elegant, spotless, and decorated with extraordinary attention to detail.

From the moment we arrived, we felt truly welcomed. A delicious cake and a bottle of wine were waiting in our room, which made our experience even more special.

The absolute highlight of our visit was the cooking class with the Barli family and Chef Govind. It was a unique evening filled with warmth, cultural exchange, and wonderful insights into authentic local recipes.

Dileep Kothi is a true oasis of peace in the heart of bustling Jaipur. We can wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone looking for a refined, personal, and unforgettable experience.

My stay at Devi Ratn Resort was nothing short of exceptional. From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with warm hospitality and a stunning ambiance that instantly transported me to a world of luxury and tranquility. The resort's architecture, inspired by Jaipur's rich cultural heritage, was a sight to behold, with every corner adorned with intricate details and exquisite craftsmanship.

The accommodations were simply divine, offering spacious and beautifully appointed rooms that provided the perfect blend of comfort and elegance. The attention to detail in every aspect of the room, from the luxurious bedding to the modern amenities, was truly impressive.

The resort's dining options were equally delightful, with a variety of culinary delights to tantalize the taste buds. Whether indulging in the sumptuous flavors of traditional Rajasthani cuisine or savoring international favorites, every meal was a culinary delight.

But perhaps the highlight of my stay was the impeccable service provided by the staff. From the friendly smiles at check-in to the personalized attention throughout my stay, every staff member went above and beyond to ensure that my experience was nothing short of perfect.

Overall, my stay at Devi Ratn Resort exceeded all expectations, and I cannot wait to return for another unforgettable experience.

text.text:
Staying at the Devi Ratn Hotel in Jaipur felt like a slice of heaven. From the moment I arrived, the warmth and kindness of every staff member made me feel incredibly special. They were always ready to help with anything I needed, their smiles adding to the joy of my stay.
They spoiled me with so many complimentary upgrades that I felt like a V.I.P.
The hotel itself is a stunning property, with every corner offering something new and delightful. Each moment spent there was memorable and magical. My time at Devi Ratn wasn't just a stay, but a beautiful journey that will remain etched in my heart forever. It was truly unforgettable.

1. A Heavenly Atmosphere
The architecture of Devi Ratn Hotel combines traditional Rajasthani elements with avant-garde design, creating a sense of being in a place that's both timeless and modern. The intricate designs and the expansive views of the Aravalli hills contribute to a surreal ambiance, mirroring what one would imagine as a heavenly setting.

2. Royal Treatment by the Staff
The generosity and helpfulness of every staff member were unparalleled. Each interaction with them was marked by earnest attention and a readiness to assist that made us feel valued and respected—truly like a king and queen.

3. Memorable Experiences
Every corner of the hotel offered a new story. Be it the evening spent by the uniquely designed poolside, the mornings sleeping in our comfy room or the nights exploring the vast area.

4. Regal Accommodations
The accommodations were a perfect blend of luxury and comfort, with meticulous attention to detail that befits royalty. The plush interiors, coupled with modern amenities and a breathtaking view, made our personal space a luxurious retreat after a day of exploration. And where do i even start with the most beautiful bathroom i had ever seen.

5. A Fond Farewell
On the day of our departure, the staff arranged a small farewell ceremony for us, replete with local music, making our last moments at the hotel as memorable as the first. The personalized farewell left us with a lingering sense of belonging and a promise to ourselves to return.

In conclusion, it was indeed like living in heaven, where every moment was enveloped in hospitality that made us feel like royalty. This hotel didn’t just host us; it celebrated us.
#RECOMMENDED💯

text.text:
Taj Devi Ratna is a breathtaking luxury resort nestled in the Aravalli hills, perfect for a serene escape. The architecture blends traditional Rajasthani grandeur with modern aesthetics. Rooms are spacious, tastefully done, and offer stunning views.

Book 1-2 months in advance or during the off-season (June end–September) for the best rates and include another meal while booking.

Check-in qnd check-out process was smooth and quick. They also gifted a souvenir during the checkout.

Complimentary services include Wi-Fi, breakfast, yoga sessions, and a delightful high tea with live folk music and dance, adding a charming cultural touch. Don’t forget to carry swimwear, light layers, and comfortable shoes.

Dining at Vyom and other in-house restaurants is excellent but on the pricier side. The resort is pet-friendly, which is great for pet lovers, but occasional barking may disturb others in shared spaces.

Though slightly away from the city, the serene setting, top-notch service, and curated experiences make this a perfect escape near Jaipur.

Nestled in the heart of the new developed Mansarovar neighborhood of Jaipur, Hyatt Regency stands as a beacon of luxury and comfort.

From the moment you step into the grand lobby, the hotel’s commitment to excellence is unmistakable. The reception glistens with tiny mirrors on the ceiling.

With five dining options, each meal is a culinary adventure, ranging from local Rajasthani fare to international cuisine.

The rooms are a testament to spacious luxury, with great views and delicious food enhancing the experience.

originalText.text:
Nestled in the heart of the new developed Mansarovar neighborhood of Jaipur, Hyatt Regency stands as a beacon of luxury and comfort.

From the moment you step into the grand lobby, the hotel’s commitment to excellence is unmistakable. The reception glistens with tiny mirrors on the ceiling.

With five dining options, each meal is a culinary adventure, ranging from local Rajasthani fare to international cuisine.

The rooms are a testament to spacious luxury, with great views and delicious food enhancing the experience.

text.text:
An Oasis Of Grandness & Good Food

This charming Hyatt offers a luxurious stay in a stunning palace-inspired setting. It delivers an opulent and modern experience that blends traditional Rajasthani charm with contemporary comforts. As soon as you enter, you feel like you're in one of those Udaipur palaces-turned-hotels. That's because the hotel has been a decade in the making, thanks to the manual stone-carving. A bunch of giant crystal chandeliers hover above you in the lobby. The owners spared no expense and employed the finest artisans from across the region(and the finest marbles and stones from across the state) to lay out every nook and corner of the property. Most importantly, the decor and architecture of the Suite we stayed in was so tastefully done it felt like we were staying in a real palace accommodation!  While Rajasthan is known for hospitality the the staff at this Hyatt took it to a whole new level making it deserve a 7-star rating, well about the 5-star tag it has.

LOCATION: Situated in the Mansarovar area, the hotel is a bit removed from the central attractions of Jaipur, such as the City Palace, Hawa Mahal, and the bustling markets of the Pink City. Nonetheless, the location offers a peaceful retreat from the city's hustle and bustle, but it may not be ideal for those looking to explore the main tourist spots frequently.

DINE + DRINK: The dining options at the Hyatt Regency Mansarovar are a highlight, with multiple restaurants offering a variety of cuisines.  The breakfast was an indulgent affair offering a multi-cuisine buffet with the specialty Rajasthani dishes receiving high marks. The main restaurant offers a wonderful array of fine local cuisine whipped up by highly skilled chefs!

ROOM: We stayed in Room 1011,which was a ROYAL DIPLOMAT SUITE;  SIZE: A huge Living Room with a much bigger Bedroom both tastefully decked up with local rajasthani craftsmanship and artwork. A marvelous experience staying amidst this. VIEW: View of the huge courtyard from the sitout outside the room; AIR-CON: Perfectly functioning cooler that helped in setting the perfect room temperature; BED: Comfortable bed that played the expected part of putting us to sleep; BATHROOM:Huge luxurious bathroom designed like a Royal place of bathing with a Stand-in shower; TOILETRIES: Wonderful Spa quality toiletries

FACILITIES: Another big highlight of the place were the recreational and health facilities. An excellent gym loaded with the state of the art fitness equipment and weights. A lovely outdoor swimming pool to soak yourself in the evening. And there is also a great Spa on site
SERVICE: Friendly staff that took care of all our needs with a smile and made us feel pampered and well taken care of. Special Shout-out to KARISHMA from the front office who provided us with a warm welcome experience along with her team (including DHANANJAY). Big thanks to YUVRAJ and JANVI from the Restaurant section for hosting us like family and in fact fattening us by indulging us with decadently delicious food! JITENDRA from the breakfast for attending to all our needs.

HOW WIRED YOU WILL BE: Free Wi-Fi that works well all over the property, and the speed is good! HUGE Smart TVs(one in each room) dishing out a wide variety of channels spanning sports, news, music, movies, and  entertainment in multiple languages

VIEW: View of the huge courtyard from the sitout outside the room; AIR-CON: Perfectly functioning cooler that helped in setting the perfect room temperature; BED: Comfortable bed that played the expected part of putting us to sleep; BATHROOM:Huge luxurious bathroom designed like a Royal place of bathing with a Stand-in shower; TOILETRIES: Wonderful Spa quality toiletries

FACILITIES: Another big highlight of the place were the recreational and health facilities. An excellent gym loaded with the state of the art fitness equipment and weights. A lovely outdoor swimming pool to soak yourself in the evening. And there is also a great Spa on site
SERVICE: Friendly staff that took care of all our needs with a smile and made us feel pampered and well taken care of. Special Shout-out to KARISHMA from the front office who provided us with a warm welcome experience along with her team (including DHANANJAY). Big thanks to YUVRAJ and JANVI from the Restaurant section for hosting us like family and in fact fattening us by indulging us with decadently delicious food! JITENDRA from the breakfast for attending to all our needs.

HOW WIRED YOU WILL BE: Free Wi-Fi that works well all over the property, and the speed is good! HUGE Smart TVs(one in each room) dishing out a wide variety of channels spanning sports, news, music, movies, and  entertainment in multiple languages

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Novotel Jaipur Convention Centre, and I must say it was an extraordinary experience that exceeded all my expectations. From the moment I stepped into the hotel, I was greeted with warm smiles and impeccable hospitality, setting the tone for a memorable stay.

The guest services at Novotel Jaipur are nothing short of exceptional. Every staff member I encountered was genuinely attentive and eager to assist with any request. The concierge provided invaluable recommendations for local attractions and dining options, making sure I had the best experience in Jaipur. The seamless check-in and check-out process further underscored the hotel’s commitment to providing top-notch service.

One of the highlights of my stay was the amazing spa. The serene and luxurious atmosphere instantly transported me to a state of relaxation. The spa menu offers a variety of treatments, and the skilled therapists tailored their techniques to ensure maximum comfort and rejuvenation. After a long day of work, the spa was the perfect retreat to unwind and recharge.

The culinary experience at Novotel Jaipur was equally impressive. The on-site restaurant serves a delectable array of dishes that cater to a variety of palates. Each meal was a delightful journey of flavours, showcasing both local Rajasthani cuisine and international favourites. The breakfast buffet was a particular standout, with an extensive selection of fresh, delicious options to start the day right. The restaurant staff were attentive and knowledgeable, enhancing the dining experience with their professionalism and warmth.

The Novotel Jaipur Convention Centre offers an unparalleled blend of luxurious accommodations, exceptional guest services, and outstanding amenities. Whether you’re in Jaipur for business or leisure, this hotel promises a stay that is both comfortable and memorable. I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a truly remarkable hotel experience.

A beautifully comfortable stay with exceptional hospitality”
"Staying at Novotel Jaipur Convention Centre was nothing short of delightful. The hotel, a relatively new property, offers spacious, impeccably clean rooms equipped with blackout curtains, a minibar, coffee station, and soundproofing—ensuring serene comfort throughout my stay

.

The prime amenities truly elevate the experience. The outdoor pool, spa with sauna and steam rooms, and the fitness centre offer generous ways to unwind

Dining was equally impressive—the Food Exchange serves both local and international cuisine, while the Gourmet Bar offers a relaxed setting for light bites

.

What truly made the stay memorable was the warm, professional staff, visible across every point of contact. From Esha at reception, whose welcoming approach set the tone right away, to Akash, Prijoy, and Sudarshan Das at the Food Exchange who anticipated our every need, the service felt genuinely personal. Evenings were brighter thanks to Vijay at the Gourmet Bar, and Neetu, Rakesh, and Vijay from security provided a polite, reassuring presence that added to our sense of safety. Their collective attentiveness made the stay feel both luxurious and heartfelt.

text.text:
I recently stayed for 7 days and 6 nights, and my experience surpassed any five-star hotel. The luxury and affordability were exceptional, but what truly made my stay memorable was the outstanding hospitality. The staff were incredibly kind and helpful, treating me like family.

I must commend Haad for his honesty and kindness; he informed me that the non-veg food served was halal, which allowed me to enjoy it comfortably. Saikat was also very understanding, arranging breakfast at 5 AM and ensuring we had food even if we were late. Other staff members, including Barsha, Aalok, Tushar, and Shahid, were equally kind and sweet, transforming my office trip into a relaxing vacation.

Roopesh at the reception was also excellent, offering a discount and seamlessly changing our room to a poolside view.

The only minor issue was the bathroom under the washbasin, which lacked proper slope for water drainage. However, the reception team promptly cleaned it to perfection whenever we reported it.

I also want to highlight the exceptional pool and other areas of the hotel. They were outstanding, and words cannot do them justice.

I highly recommend this place for its exceptional service and commend the staff for their dedication. Special recognition and promotion should be considered for Haad, Saikat, and the others mentioned.

text.text:
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Hyatt Place, Jaipur – Perfect Stay!

I recently stayed at Hyatt Place, Jaipur, and I must say it was an exceptional experience! The hotel is located in a peaceful yet well-connected area, making it perfect for both leisure and business trips.

The rooms were spacious, spotless, and beautifully designed, offering both comfort and luxury. The bed was super comfortable, and the view from the room added to the charm in city

One of the highlights of my stay was the delicious food. From the breakfast buffet to à la carte dinner options, everything was freshly prepared and packed with flavor. The variety and taste truly exceeded my expectations!

What really made the experience stand out was the hospitality of the staff. Every member of the team was courteous, attentive, and always ready to help with a smile. Their warmth and professionalism made us feel truly welcome.

In terms of safety and hygiene, the hotel followed all proper protocols. Cleanliness, sanitization, and security were clearly a priority, which gave us complete peace of mind throughout the stay.

I would highly recommend Hyatt Place, Jaipur to anyone looking for a safe, relaxing, and premium hotel experience. Looking forward to visiting again!

Our recent stay at Sarovar Premiere was nothing short of exceptional. The hotel offers a perfect blend of comfort, elegance, and warm hospitality. From the moment we entered, we were welcomed by the hotel’s beautiful ambience.
One of the standout aspects of our stay was the delicious food. The breakfast spread was impressive, with a variety of fresh options to cater to different tastes. A special mention goes to Mr. Rahul, who made our breakfast experience incredibly smooth and enjoyable. His attentiveness, polite demeanor, and quick service truly elevated our dining experience. He ensured that everything we needed was taken care of.
The entire staff at Sarovar Premiere deserves appreciation for their professionalism and kindness. Every interaction was met with a smile, making us feel genuinely valued as guests.

If you’re visiting Jaipur and looking for a 5-star stay with great ambience, courteous staff, and excellent food, Sarovar Premiere is a highly recommended choice. We left with happy memories and will definitely return on our next trip to the Pink City.
